code: const TOKEN_KEY='ubu_auth_token';const USER_KEY='ubu_auth_user';export function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);}export function setToken(token){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);}export function clearToken(){localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);}export function getUser(){const raw=localStorage.getItem(USER_KEY);return raw?JSON.parse(raw):null;}export function setUser(user){localStorage.setItem(USER_KEY,JSON.stringify(user));}export function logout(){clearToken();localStorage.removeItem(USER_KEY);}
